name: Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens and Baths
name_original: Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens and Baths
description:
Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens and Baths is a strategy game developed by Big Blue Bubble. It came out on 04-09-2008. Oberon Media published the game.
Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens and Baths is available on PC.
